lines.text: Did you kill seven at one blow?
I was all alone. I heard them coming. I looked up, and I was surronded.
They were here, there, everywhere! A whole bunch of them! They came at me from the left! From the right! Right! Left! Left! Right!
They were coming closer. The fight was on. I swung and missed. I missed and swung. I swung again and again and again! They were right on top of me!
And then, I let 'em have it!
Say, did you ever kill a giant?
I killed seven with one blow!
Whoopee! I'll cut him down to my size!
Well, so long! I'll be seeing ya! I hope!
